channel.title: Help- Need tips and suggestions to add in my server
channel.description:
-Goals- -Max stat is 99 -Change Color of most of runescape interface text -Combat level is 126 -Proper save system (saves after 7k xp, after every levelup,death,and like every minute) -Full magic with levels and runes -90% range with proper hits (no arrows flying out) -Full Attack and Defense bounses -Proper Weapon and Armour requirments -Proper Damage delt -No over clicking to kill some one or on objects -Proper food timers -Proper weapon speeds -Face object when using it -Better Xp when fighting monsters -Full Mining,Smithing -Full Fishing and Cooking -Full Woodcutting, Fletching and Firemaking -Full Herblore -Full Runecrafting, Prayer -Full Theiving,crafting -Full Slayer,Agility,Farming -Hp slowly grows back when hurt -Critical Blow (adds 20 damage to your natural hit) -Npc's drop items -Place all objects on my server -Adding balanced shops -Pick new starting place -Make diffrent Cities to visit -Add 4 Rewarding minigames (save points to buy, xp, runes,arrows,armour,food,weapons,potions,supplies, and other usefull stuff) -Face person when fighting -Full working potions -Add Arena's for pking (1-60 defense pk together 61-99 pk together then there is a free for all) -Add Restrictions to all Objects -Add my own skill called Luck (Improves the chances of getting better drops, How much items you get to keep when you die,Get free stuff from NPC's, How well potions effect you,How often you do a critical) After i get this done i think ill have a beta for people to play on -Full special attacks(working bar) -Tasks need to be done before using certain weapons -Dungeons And things For Training
Well this is going to be my project that im going to be working on for awhile. I need some ideas of what things i should add in my sever. Like is there anything i missing. also what base source should i make this, i dont want a source that is really edited i want that is like testscape,pimpscape,cheezscape 80,cheezscape 78 pk or ones like that

item.title: Help- Need tips and suggestions to add in my server
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok, but can you cheak out my thread 1st? see if you can help me with this custom interface special bar plox

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


its SOO close to being useable, i jus need the ability to CLICK it :\

Read full topic

item.title: Help- Need tips and suggestions to add in my server
item.dc:creator: @Dish_Weed Dish Weed
item.description:
@Dish_Weed wrote:

-Goals-
-Max stat is 99
-Change Color of most of runescape interface text
-Combat level is 126
-Proper save system (saves after 7k xp, after every levelup,death,and like every minute)
-Full magic with levels and runes
-90% range with proper hits (no arrows flying out)
-Full Attack and Defense bounses
-Proper Weapon and Armour requirments
-Proper Damage delt
-No over clicking to kill some one or on objects
-Proper food timers
-Proper weapon speeds
-Face object when using it
-Better Xp when fighting monsters
-Full Mining,Smithing
-Full Fishing and Cooking
-Full Woodcutting, Fletching and Firemaking
-Full Herblore
-Full Runecrafting, Prayer
-Full Theiving,crafting
-Full Slayer,Agility,Farming
-Hp slowly grows back when hurt
-Critical Blow (adds 20 damage to your natural hit)
-Npc’s drop items
-Place all objects on my server
-Adding balanced shops
-Pick new starting place
-Make diffrent Cities to visit
-Add 4 Rewarding minigames (save points to buy, xp, runes,arrows,armour,food,weapons,potions,supplies, and other usefull stuff)
-Face person when fighting
-Full working potions
-Add Arena’s for pking (1-60 defense pk together 61-99 pk together then there is a free for all)
-Add Restrictions to all Objects
-Add my own skill called Luck (Improves the chances of getting better drops, How much items you get to keep when you die,Get free stuff from NPC’s, How well potions effect you,How often you do a critical)
After i get this done i think ill have a beta for people to play on
-Full special attacks(working bar)
-Tasks need to be done before using certain weapons
-Dungeons And things For Training

Well this is going to be my project that im going to be working on for awhile. I need some ideas of what things i should
add in my sever. Like is there anything i missing. also what base source should i make this, i dont want a source that is really
edited i want that is like testscape,pimpscape,cheezscape 80,cheezscape 78 pk or ones like that

Read full topic
